title: I Know What You're Doing: The Whole Story
description: This story is based on real-life events.What happens when an old flame comes back into your life?Do you remember the good times and leave the past buried?Or do you head down a path that will blow your world apart?Zane is married to the love of his life, Jenna.Depressed and disillusioned with his life, he contacts his old college friend and they embark upon a dangerous affair, that will have far reaching consequences for all concerned.Love, secrets, lies, redemption, and a heartbreaking conclusion - life will never be the same again This series incorporates;Part One - She Loves to Watch Me PlayPart Two - Our Dirty Little SecretsPart Three - Till Death Us Do Part
author: Zane Michaelson
